stories.Title: The chatbot frenzy is wearing off
stories.Description: The initial hype surrounding AI chatbots appears to be fading. According to SimilarWeb, global traffic to the ChatGPT webpage fell by 9.7% in June, marking the first drop since its launch.
stories.Tweet: The chatbot frenzy is wearing off 📦 The initial hype surrounding AI chatbots appears to be fading. According to SimilarWeb, global traffic to the ChatGPT webpage fell by 9.7% in June, marking the first drop since its launch. #chatgpt https://gizmodo.com/chatgpts-website-traffic-dipped-for-the-first-time-sinc-1850606984

stories.Title: Today's forecast: Cloudy with a chance of AI
stories.Description: Climate change demands more accurate and timely weather forecasts. Recent research showcases the potential of AI models, such as Huawei's Pangu-Weather, to surpass conventional forecasting techniques.
stories.Tweet: Today's forecast: Cloudy with a chance of AI 📦 Climate change demands more accurate and timely weather forecasts. Recent research showcases the potential of AI models, such as Huawei's Pangu-Weather, to surpass conventional forecasting techniques. #ai https://www.technologyreview.com/2023/07/05/1075897/new-ai-systems-could-speed-up-our-ability-to-create-weather-forecasts

stories.Title: Choose the perfect GPT
stories.Description: OpenAI's language models continue to evolve and redefine natural language processing. This comprehensive analysis helps you select the model that best aligns with your needs.
stories.Tweet: Choose the perfect GPT 📦 OpenAI's language models continue to evolve and redefine natural language processing. This comprehensive analysis helps you select the model that best aligns with your needs. #openai https://www.marktechpost.com/2023/07/05/from-gpt-1-to-gpt-4-a-comprehensive-analysis-and-comparison-of-openais-evolving-language-models/

stories.Title: Surveillance for superintelligence
stories.Description: With the rise of superintelligent AI on the horizon, OpenAI takes the lead in risk management. A new team, led by top researchers aims to ensure safety and alignment with human values.
stories.Tweet: Surveillance for superintelligence 📦 With the rise of superintelligent AI on the horizon, OpenAI takes the lead in risk management. A new team, led by top researchers aims to ensure safety and alignment with human values. #openai https://www.engadget.com/openai-is-forming-a-team-to-rein-in-superintelligent-ai-214333388.html

stories.Title: In a far dusty galaxy
stories.Description: Thanks to the James Webb Space Telescope's MIRI, researchers have discovered substantial amounts of dust within two supernovae, revealing their role in dust formation.
stories.Tweet: In a far dusty galaxy 📦 Thanks to the James Webb Space Telescope's MIRI, researchers have discovered substantial amounts of dust within two supernovae, revealing their role in dust formation. #space https://webbtelescope.org/contents/news-releases/2023/news-2023-115

stories.Title: A revolution in solid-state batteries
stories.Description: With plans to produce solid-state battery-equipped cars by 2027, Toyota's latest innovation promises to transform the EV market, delivering longer ranges and faster charging times.
stories.Tweet: A revolution in solid-state batteries 📦 With plans to produce solid-state battery-equipped cars by 2027, Toyota's latest innovation promises to transform the EV market, delivering longer ranges and faster charging times. #toyota https://interestingengineering.com/transportation/toyotas-solid-state-battery-breakthrough-reduce-costs-and-size-by-50-percent

stories.Title: Volkswagen considers joining the NACS club
stories.Description: Reports suggest that the German automaker is exploring a partnership with Tesla to adopt the renowned NACS connector, prioritizing open standards and customer convenience.
stories.Tweet: Volkswagen considers joining the NACS club 📦 Reports suggest that the German automaker is exploring a partnership with Tesla to adopt the renowned NACS connector, prioritizing open standards and customer convenience. #volkswagen https://www.techtimes.com/articles/293491/20230706/volkswagen-adopt-tesla-nacs-charger-vw-already-talks-follows-electrify.htm

stories.Title: Tesla's robot: The ultimate salesman
stories.Description: Sources indicate that Optimus is making its way to Tesla stores in China to enhance the retail experience. This strategic move aims to create unique and engaging experiences for customers.
stories.Tweet: Tesla's robot: The ultimate salesman 📦 Sources indicate that Optimus is making its way to Tesla stores in China to enhance the retail experience. This strategic move aims to create unique and engaging experiences for customers. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/07/06/tesla-use-optimus-robot-stores-help-sales/

stories.Title: On the road to autonomy
stories.Description: In collaboration with MobileEye, Volkswagen embarks on its autonomous journey with a groundbreaking program in the US, outfitting 10 ID. Buzz vans with self-driving tech.
stories.Tweet: On the road to autonomy 📦 In collaboration with MobileEye, Volkswagen embarks on its autonomous journey with a groundbreaking program in the US, outfitting 10 ID. Buzz vans with self-driving tech. #volkswagen https://www.digitaltrends.com/cars/volkswagen-testing-self-driving-cars-in-us/

stories.Title: Unfold the future
stories.Description: The world of foldable smartphones is expanding, and Samsung is upping its game with the Galaxy Z Fold 5 and Z Flip 5. These official renders give us a sneak peek of what's coming next.
stories.Tweet: Unfold the future 📦 The world of foldable smartphones is expanding, and Samsung is upping its game with the Galaxy Z Fold 5 and Z Flip 5. These official renders give us a sneak peek of what's coming next. #samsung https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/07/official-renders-of-the-samsung-galaxy-z-fold-5-and-flip-5-leak/

stories.Title: Europe’s space odyssey
stories.Description: Ariane 6's timeline has been pushed back continuously due to development hurdles. Europe's ambitious heavy-lift rocket, slated for a late 2023 debut, could now see its first flight in 2024 or later.
stories.Tweet: Europe’s space odyssey 📦 Ariane 6's timeline has been pushed back continuously due to development hurdles. Europe's ambitious heavy-lift rocket, slated for a late 2023 debut, could now see its first flight in 2024 or later. #arianespace https://www.space.com/ariane-6-new-european-rocket-delays
